akn:section.akn:heading: Rules governing the business of furnishing towing services for motor vehicles.

akn:content.akn:p: The Mayor is authorized, in accordance with [subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2], to:

Rules proposed pursuant to this section shall be submitted to the Council for a 45-day period of review, excluding Saturdays, Sundays, legal holidays, and days of Council recess. If the Council does not approve or disapprove the proposed regulations, in whole or in part, by resolution, within this 45-day review period, the proposed regulations shall be deemed disapproved.
